data_table.description: Neurocognitive Test Repeat, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR1
variable.description: Q1. Digital symbol substitution [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR1A
variable.description: Q1a. Digital symbol substitution reason [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR1B
variable.description: Q1b. Digital symbol substitution score [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR2
variable.description: Q2. Delayed word recall task [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR2A
variable.description: Q2a. Delayed word recall task reason [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR2B
variable.description: Q2b. Delayed word recall task score [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR3
variable.description: Q3. Word fluency [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR3A
variable.description: Q3a. Word fluency reason [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR3B
variable.description: Q3b. Word fluency. F Total [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR3C
variable.description: Q3c. Word fluency. A Total [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR3D
variable.description: Q3d. Word fluency. S Total [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR3E
variable.description: Q3e. Word fluency. Word fluency score [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]

variable.name: NTR0AY
variable.description: Q0a. Year of completion date [Neurocognitive Test Repeat Form]
